title: Where is the Patient Education Page?
body:
Patient education are ready made materials / resources / handouts that you can share with your patients on a broad range of topics. Search the community library, access them from with a patient file and even create and share your own authored material.

Follow these steps to Locate the Patient Education page:
Click More (the sixth tab on the MediRecords application ribbon) to reveal a drop-down list
Click Resources
Click Patient Education
This will open the list of MediRecords patient education resources
NOTE: To access patient education from a patient record, follow the below steps:
Open the patients record
Select the Clinical tab
Select the outlined image below (hovering over this image will display the title Patient Education:
Select from one of the source options for the education:
Sonoa Health
NPS
MediRecords User
Open the desired resource and save


If you are interested in uploading or even creating your own Patient Education Resources investigate the Resources : Patient Education
